ranks.description: The <u>Additional DMG</u> dealt by the Zone increases to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG. When the Zone deals <u>Additional DMG</u>, further deals <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> instance(s) of Additional DMG.

ranks.name: Trove of Morning Glow
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Peace of Empathy Bond
ranks.description: While "Numinosity" lasts, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the target's DEF.

ranks.name: Clock of Wonder Origin
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Morrow of Star Shine
ranks.description: After Tribbie uses Ultimate, launches her Talent's <u>Follow-up ATK</u> against all enemies. The DMG dealt by Talent's <u>Follow-up ATK</u> increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

1404.name: Mydei
1404.description:
Kremnos, the mist-shrouded city of chaos and war! Its royal lineage is tainted with patricide, and its god bears the name of calamity.
The undying Mydeimos, the lion apart from the rest. Chrysos Heir who seeks the Coreflame of Strife, must suffer a thousand deaths, be bathed in blood on the path home, and bear the madness of fate alone.
 Kingslayer be king, godslayer be god. Iron-hooves pound across the wilderness for the campaign, and must eventually soak in the blood of their homeland.

skills.name: Vow of Voyage
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Deaths are Legion, Regrets are None
skills.description: Consumes HP by an amount equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Mydei's current HP. Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf the current HP is not sufficient, using Skill reduces Mydei's current HP to 1.

skills.name: Throne of Bones
skills.description: Restores HP by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP and accumulates <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> Talent's Charge point(s). Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy, and deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets. Additionally, Taunts the target and targets adjacent to it, lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s). The next use of "Godslayer Be God" prioritizes attacking one designated enemy, and this effect only works on the latest target.

skills.name: Blood for Blood
skills.description: For each 1% of HP lost, accumulates 1 point of Charge (up to <unbreak>200</unbreak> points). When Charge reaches <unbreak>100</unbreak>, consumes <unbreak>100</unbreak> points of Charge to enter the "Vendetta" state, restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP, and advances action by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>. While the "Vendetta" state is active, Max HP increases by <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak> of the current Max HP and DEF remains at 0. At the start of this unit's turn, automatically uses "Kingslayer Be King."\nWhen Charge reaches <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> points during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei immediately gains 1 <u>extra turn</u> and automatically uses "Godslayer Be God."\nWhen receiving a killing blow during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei will not be <u>knocked down</u>, but will clear his Charge, exits the "Vendetta" state, and restores HP by <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Cage of Broken Lance
skills.description: After using Technique, pulls in enemies within a certain area and inflicts Daze on them for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack ally targets.\nIf actively attacking Dazed enemies, when entering battle, deals Imaginary DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Mydei's Max HP to all enemies, and Taunts the targets, lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This unit accumulates <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Talent's Charge.

skills.name: Kingslayer Be King
skills.description: Consumes HP by an amount equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Mydei's current HP. Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to one enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf the current HP is not sufficient, using Skill reduces Mydei's current HP to 1.\nThis ability will be automatically used.

skills.name: Godslayer Be God
skills.description: Consumes <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge. Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to one enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets.\nThis ability will be automatically used. While this ability is in use, Charge cannot be accumulated.

tree.name: Vow of Voyage
tree.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Deaths are Legion, Regrets are None
tree.description:
Consumes HP by an amount equal to **3[i]%** of Mydei's current HP. Deals Imaginary DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets.
If the current HP is not sufficient, using Skill reduces Mydei's current HP to 1.

tree.name: Throne of Bones
tree.description: Restores HP by ****3[f1]%**** of Mydei's Max HP and accumulates **5[i]** Talent's Charge point(s). Deals Imaginary DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy, and deals Imaginary DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets. Additionally, Taunts the target and targets adjacent to it, lasting for **4[i]** turn(s). The next use of "Godslayer Be God" prioritizes attacking one designated enemy, and this effect only works on the latest target.

tree.name: Blood for Blood
tree.description:
For each 1% of HP lost, accumulates 1 point of Charge (up to **200** points). When Charge reaches **100**, consumes **100** points of Charge to enter the "Vendetta" state, restores HP equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mydei's Max HP, and advances action by **100%**. While the "Vendetta" state is active, Max HP increases by **5[i]%** of the current Max HP and DEF remains at 0. At the start of this unit's turn, automatically uses "Kingslayer Be King."
When Charge reaches **3[i]** points during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei immediately gains 1 **extra turn** and automatically uses "Godslayer Be God."
When receiving a killing blow during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei will not be **knocked down**, but will clear his Charge, exits the "Vendetta" state, and restores HP by **4[i]%** of his Max HP.

tree.name: Cage of Broken Lance
tree.description:
After using Technique, pulls in enemies within a certain area and inflicts Daze on them for **1[i]** second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack ally targets.
If actively attacking Dazed enemies, when entering battle, deals Imaginary DMG equal to **2[i]%** of Mydei's Max HP to all enemies, and Taunts the targets, lasting for **4[i]** turn(s). This unit accumulates **5[i]** point(s) of Talent's Charge.

tree.name: Earth and Water
tree.description: During the "Vendetta" state, Mydei will not exit the "Vendetta" state when receiving a killing blow. This effect can trigger **3** time(s) per battle.

tree.name: Thirty Tyrants
tree.description: While in the "Vendetta" state, Mydei is immune to **Crowd Control debuffs**.

tree.name: Bloodied Chiton
tree.description: When battle starts, if Mydei's Max HP exceeds **4000**, for every **100** excess HP, Mydei's CRIT Rate increases by **1.2%**, his Charge ratio from enemy targets' DMG increases by **2.5%**, and his Incoming Healing increases by **5[f2]%**. Up to **4000** excess HP can be taken into account for this effect.

ranks.name: Frost Hones Spine of Steel
ranks.description: Increases the DMG multiplier dealt by "Godslayer Be God" to the primary target by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. This ability now deals to all enemies Imaginary DMG equal to the DMG multiplier dealt to the primary target.

ranks.name: Strife Beholds Cry of Dead
ranks.description: During "Vendetta," the DMG dealt by Mydei ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of enemy targets' DEF. After he receives healing, converts <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the healed amount to Charge. The tally of the converted Charge cannot exceed <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> point(s). Resets this tally of Charge after any unit takes action.

ranks.name: Honor Exalts Feast of Faith
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Siren Jolts the Laconic Lion
ranks.description: While in "Vendetta," increases CRIT DMG by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> and restores HP by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of this unit's Max HP after receiving attacks from enemy targets.

ranks.name: War Chisels Flesh of Flame
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Legacy Scales Mound of Blood
ranks.description: When entering battle, immediately enters the "Vendetta" state, and lowers the Charge required for "Godslayer Be God" to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s).

1405.name: Anaxa
1405.description:
The Grove of Epiphany, where knowledge flourishes and philosophers are born.
Yet here stands Anaxagoras the blasphemer, the Chrysos Heir who challenges the Coreflame of Reason. He is questioned: Would you defy the prophecy even if you must bear infamy, and insist on driving the thorns of doubt into the Sacred Tree of wisdom?
**"Ridiculous. In a world full of lies, I am the only truth."**

skills.name: Pain, Brews Truth
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Anaxa's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Fractal, Exiles Fallacy
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Anaxa's ATK to one designated enemy and additionally deals <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> instance(s) of DMG. Each instance of DMG deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Anaxa's ATK to one random enemy, prioritizing Bouncing to enemy targets that have not been hit by this instance of Skill.\nWhen used, for each attackable enemy on the field, this Skill has its DMG dealt increased by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

skills.name: Sprouting Life Sculpts Earth
skills.description: Inflicts the "Sublimation" state on all enemies, then deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Anaxa's ATK to all enemies.\nIn the "Sublimation" state, the targets will be simultaneously inflicted with Physical, Fire, Ice, Lightning, Wind, Quantum, and Imaginary Weaknesses, lasting until the start of the targets' turn. If the targets do not have Control RES, they are unable to take action in the "Sublimation" state.

skills.name: Tetrad Wisdom Reigns Thrice
skills.description: Each time Anaxa lands 1 hit on enemy targets, inflicts 1 Weakness of a random Type to the targets, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s), with priority to the Weakness Type that the target doesn't already possess.\nWhile Anaxa is on the field, inflicts the "Qualitative Disclosure" state on enemy targets that have at least <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> different Types of Weaknesses. Anaxa deals <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> increased DMG to targets afflicted with the "Qualitative Disclosure" state. In addition, after using Basic ATK or Skill on them, unleashes 1 additional instance of Skill on the targets. This additional Skill does not consume any Skill Points and cannot trigger this effect again. If the target has been defeated before the additional Skill is used, it will be cast on one random enemy instead.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Prism of the Pupil
skills.description: After using Technique, inflicts the Terrified state on enemies in a set area. Terrified enemies will flee in a direction away from Anaxa for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> second(s). When allies enter battle via actively attacking a Terrified enemy, it will always be considered as entering battle via attacking a Weakness. After entering battle, Anaxa applies 1 Weakness of the attacker's Type to every enemy target, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

tree.name: Pain, Brews Truth
tree.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Anaxa's ATK to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Fractal, Exiles Fallacy
tree.description:
Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Anaxa's ATK to one designated enemy and additionally deals **2[i]** instance(s) of DMG. Each instance of DMG deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Anaxa's ATK to one random enemy, prioritizing Bouncing to enemy targets that have not been hit by this instance of Skill.
When used, for each attackable enemy on the field, this Skill has its DMG dealt increased by **3[i]%**.

tree.name: Sprouting Life Sculpts Earth
tree.description:
Inflicts the "Sublimation" state on all enemies, then deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Anaxa's ATK to all enemies.
In the "Sublimation" state, the targets will be simultaneously inflicted with Physical, Fire, Ice, Lightning, Wind, Quantum, and Imaginary Weaknesses, lasting until the start of the targets' turn. If the targets do not have Control RES, they are unable to take action in the "Sublimation" state.

tree.name: Tetrad Wisdom Reigns Thrice
tree.description:
Each time Anaxa lands 1 hit on enemy targets, inflicts 1 Weakness of a random Type to the targets, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s), with priority to the Weakness Type that the target doesn't already possess.
While Anaxa is on the field, inflicts the "Qualitative Disclosure" state on enemy targets that have at least **3[i]** different Types of Weaknesses. Anaxa deals ****1[i]%**** increased DMG to targets afflicted with the "Qualitative Disclosure" state. In addition, after using Basic ATK or Skill on them, unleashes 1 additional instance of Skill on the targets. This additional Skill does not consume any Skill Points and cannot trigger this effect again. If the target has been defeated before the additional Skill is used, it will be cast on one random enemy instead.

tree.name: Prism of the Pupil
tree.description: After using Technique, inflicts the Terrified state on enemies in a set area. Terrified enemies will flee in a direction away from Anaxa for **1[i]** second(s). When allies enter battle via actively attacking a Terrified enemy, it will always be considered as entering battle via attacking a Weakness. After entering battle, Anaxa applies 1 Weakness of the attacker's Type to every enemy target, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s).

tree.name: Roaming Signifier
tree.description:
When using Basic ATK, additionally regenerates **10** Energy.
At the start of the turn, if there are no enemy targets in the "Qualitative Disclosure" state, immediately regenerates **30** Energy.

tree.name: Imperative Hiatus
tree.description:
Based on the number of "Erudition" characters in the team, one of the following effects will be triggered in the current battle:
1 character: Increases Anaxa's CRIT DMG by **140%**.
At least 2 characters: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by **50%**.

tree.name: Qualitative Shift
tree.description: For every 1 different Weakness Type an enemy target has, the DMG that Anaxa deals to that target ignores **4%** of their DEF. Up to a max of 7 Weakness Types can be taken into account for this effect.

ranks.name: Magician, Isolated by Stars
ranks.description: After using Skill for the first time, recovers <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s). When using Skill to hit enemy targets, decreases the targets' DEF by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

ranks.name: Soul, True to History
ranks.description: When enemy targets enter the battlefield, triggers 1 instance of the Talent's Weakness Implant effect, and reduces their All-Type RES by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Pupil, Etched into Cosmos
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Blaze, Plunged to Canyon
ranks.description: When using Skill, increases ATK by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s).

ranks.name: Embryo, Set Beyond Vortex
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Everything Is in Everything
ranks.description: The DMG dealt by Anaxa is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG. The 2 effects in the Trace "Imperative Hiatus" will be triggered directly and will no longer depend on the number of "Erudition" characters in the team.

1407.name: Castorice
1407.description:
Aidonia, the snowy land that respects and worships death, has already sunken into sweet slumber.
O Castorice, daughter of the River of Souls, the Chrysos Heir in search of the Coreflame of "Death," set forth! Guard the lament of the souls in this world, and embrace the solitude of destiny.
 Life and death is a journey. When a butterfly rests on that dead branch, the withered will be reborn again.

skills.name: Lament, Nethersea's Ripple
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Silence, Wraithfly's Caress
skills.description: Consumes <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of all allies' current HP. Deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy and Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Castorice's Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.\nIf Netherwing is on the battlefield, the Skill becomes "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace" instead.

skills.name: Doomshriek, Dawn's Chime
skills.description: <u>Summons the memosprite</u> Netherwing and <u>advances its action</u> by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>. At the same time, deploys the <u>Territory</u> "Lost Netherland," which decreases all enemies' All-Type RES by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>. If Castorice has the DMG Boost effect from her Talent, then this effect spreads to Netherwing. Netherwing has an initial SPD of <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> and a set Max HP equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of max "Newbud."\nAfter Netherwing experiences <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turns or when its HP is 0, it disappears and dispels the <u>Territory</u> "Lost Netherland."

skills.name: Desolation Across Palms
skills.description: The maximum limit of "Newbud" is related to the levels of all characters on the battlefield. For every 1 point of HP lost by all allies, Castorice gains 1 point of "Newbud." When "Newbud" reaches its maximum limit, can activate the Ultimate. When allies lose HP, Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s), lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nWhen Netherwing is on the field, "Newbud" cannot be gained through Talent, and every 1 point of HP lost by all allies (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Wail, Death's Herald
skills.description: After using Technique, enters the "Netherveil" state that lasts for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> seconds. While "Netherveil" is active, enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.\nDuring "Netherveil," active attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, <u>summons the memosprite</u> Netherwing, <u>advances its action</u> by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>, and deploys the <u>Territory</u> "Lost Netherland." Netherwing has its current HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of max "Newbud." After entering battle, consumes <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing).\nIf Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of max "Newbud."

skills.name: Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace
skills.description: Consumes <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing). Castorice and Netherwing launch <u>Joint ATK</u> on the targets, dealing Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Castorice's Max HP to all enemies.\nIf the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.

tree.name: Lament, Nethersea's Ripple
tree.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Silence, Wraithfly's Caress
tree.description:
Consumes **1[i]%** of all allies' current HP. Deals Quantum DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy and Quantum DMG equal to ****3[i]%**** of Castorice's Max HP to adjacent targets.
If the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.
If Netherwing is on the battlefield, the Skill becomes "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace" instead.

tree.name: Doomshriek, Dawn's Chime
tree.description:
**Summons the memosprite** Netherwing and **advances its action** by **100%**. At the same time, deploys the **Territory** "Lost Netherland," which decreases all enemies' All-Type RES by ****4[i]%****. If Castorice has the DMG Boost effect from her Talent, then this effect spreads to Netherwing. Netherwing has an initial SPD of **1[i]** and a set Max HP equal to **3[i]%** of max "Newbud."
After Netherwing experiences **2[i]** turns or when its HP is 0, it disappears and dispels the **Territory** "Lost Netherland."

tree.name: Desolation Across Palms
tree.description:
The maximum limit of "Newbud" is related to the levels of all characters on the battlefield. For every 1 point of HP lost by all allies, Castorice gains 1 point of "Newbud." When "Newbud" reaches its maximum limit, can activate the Ultimate. When allies lose HP, Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt increases by ****2[i]%****. This effect can stack up to **3[i]** time(s), lasting for **4[i]** turn(s).
When Netherwing is on the field, "Newbud" cannot be gained through Talent, and every 1 point of HP lost by all allies (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.

tree.name: Wail, Death's Herald
tree.description:
After using Technique, enters the "Netherveil" state that lasts for **3[i]** seconds. While "Netherveil" is active, enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.
During "Netherveil," active attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, **summons the memosprite** Netherwing, **advances its action** by **100%**, and deploys the **Territory** "Lost Netherland." Netherwing has its current HP equal to **2[i]%** of max "Newbud." After entering battle, consumes **1[i]%** of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing).
If Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to **4[i]%** of max "Newbud."

tree.name: Contained Dark Tide
tree.description: After ally targets (excluding Netherwing) receive healing, converts **100%** of the healed amount into "Newbud." If Netherwing is on the field, this is converted to Netherwing's HP instead. Each ally target can accumulate a conversion amount up to **12%** of the max "Newbud." After any unit takes action, all units reset their accumulated conversion amount.

tree.name: Inverted Torch
tree.description: When Castorice's current HP is higher than or equal to **50%** of her Max HP, her SPD increases by **40%**. When Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and deals fatal damage to all enemies on the field or brings them to a point where their HP cannot be reduced further, Netherwing's SPD increases by **100%**, lasting for 1 turn.

tree.name: Where The West Wind Dwells
tree.description: Each time Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow," the DMG dealt increases by **30%**. This effect stacks up to **6** time(s) and lasts until the end of this turn.

ranks.name: Snowbound Maiden, Memory to Tomb
ranks.description: When the enemy target's current HP is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Max HP or lower, the DMG dealt to it by "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace," "Claw Splits the Veil," "Breath Scorches the Shadow," and "Wings Sweep the Ruins" is <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG respectively.

ranks.name: Crown on Wings of Bloom
ranks.description: After summoning the memosprite Netherwing, Castorice gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stack(s) of "Ardent Will." "Ardent Will" can stack up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s) and can be used to offset the HP cost of Netherwing's Memosprite Skill, "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and <u>advance Castorice's action</u> by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>. When using the next Enhanced Skill, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of max "Newbud."

ranks.name: Pious Pilgrim, Dance in Doom
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Rest in Songs of Gloom
ranks.description: While Castorice is on the field, all allies' Incoming Healing during HP restoration increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Pristine Pages, Prophecy as Plume
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Await for Years to Loom
ranks.description: When Castorice or Netherwing deals DMG, increases Quantum <u>RES PEN</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. During Netherwing's attacks, can reduce enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Quantum Weakness Break effect. And the number of Bounces for Netherwing's Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins" additionally increases by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

tree.name: Unwavering Gallantry
tree.description: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by **5%** of their Max HP.

tree.name: Action Beats Overthinking
tree.description: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases their ATK by **15%** and regenerates **5** Energy until the action is over.

ranks.name: Earth-Shaking Resonance
ranks.description: When the Trailblazer uses their Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the Trailblazer's DEF. When the Trailblazer uses their enhanced Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the Trailblazer's DEF.

ranks.name: Time-Defying Tenacity
ranks.description: The Shield applied to all allies from the Trailblazer's Talent will block extra DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the Trailblazer's DEF plus <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Trail-Blazing Blueprint
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Nation-Building Oath
ranks.description: At the start of the battle, immediately gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stack(s) of Magma Will.

ranks.name: Spirit-Warming Flame
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: City-Forging Bulwarks
ranks.description: After the Trailblazer uses enhanced Basic ATK or Ultimate, their DEF increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Stacks up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).

8005.name: Harmony Caelus
8005.description:
A {Fgirl{Mboy who boarded the Astral Express.
{FShe{MHe chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

skills.name: Swing Dance Etiquette
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Halftime to Make It Rain
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy and additionally deals DMG for 4 times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: <unbreak>All-Out</unbreak> <unbreak>Footlight Parade</unbreak>
skills.description: Grants all allies the Backup Dancer effect, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Trailblazer's every turn. Allies with the Backup Dancer effect have their Break Effect increased by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>. And when they attack enemy targets that are in the <u>Weakness Broken state</u>, the Toughness Reduction of the attack will be converted into 1 instance of <u>Super Break DMG</u>.

skills.name: Full-on Aerial Dance
skills.description: The Trailblazer immediately regenerates <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]</unbreak></color> Energy when an enemy target's Weakness is Broken.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Now! I'm the Band!
skills.description: After the Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

tree.name: Swing Dance Etiquette
tree.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy.

tree.name: <unbreak>All-Out</unbreak> <unbreak>Footlight Parade</unbreak>
tree.description: Grants all allies the Backup Dancer effect, lasting for **1[i]** turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Trailblazer's every turn. Allies with the Backup Dancer effect have their Break Effect increased by ****3[i]%****. And when they attack enemy targets that are in the **Weakness Broken state**, the Toughness Reduction of the attack will be converted into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG**.

tree.name: Full-on Aerial Dance
tree.description: The Trailblazer immediately regenerates ****1[f1]**** Energy when an enemy target's Weakness is Broken.

tree.name: Now! I'm the Band!
tree.description: After the Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by **1[i]%**, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s).

tree.name: Dance With the One
tree.description: When the number of enemy targets on the field is 5 (or more)/4/3/2/1, the **Super Break DMG** triggered by the Backup Dancer effect increases by **20%**/**30%**/**40%**/**50%**/**60%**.

tree.name: Shuffle Along
tree.description: When using Skill, additionally increases the Toughness Reduction of the first instance of DMG by **100%**.

tree.name: Hat of the Theater
tree.description: After ally targets break weakness, additionally **delays the action** of the enemy target by **30%**.

ranks.name: Best Seat in the House
ranks.description: After using Skill for the first time, immediately recovers <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s).

ranks.name: Jailbreaking Rainbowwalk
ranks.description: When the battle starts, the Trailblazer's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

ranks.name: Sanatorium for Rest Notes
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Dove in Tophat
ranks.description: While the Trailblazer is on the field, increases the Break Effect of all teammates (excluding the Trailblazer), by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the Trailblazer's Break Effect.

ranks.name: Poem Favors Rhythms of Old
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Tomorrow, Rest in Spotlight
ranks.description: The number of additional DMG applications by the Skill increases by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>.

8007.name: Remembrance Caelus
8007.description:
A {Fgirl{Mboy who boarded the Astral Express.
{FShe{MHe chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

tree.name: Leave It to Me!
tree.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Trailblazer's ATK to one designated enemy.

tree.name: I Choose You!
tree.description: **Summons the memosprite** Mem. If Mem is already on the field, restores Mem's HP by an amount equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mem's Max HP, and grants Mem **2[i]%** Charge.

tree.name: Together, Mem!
tree.description: **Summons memosprite** Mem. Grants Mem **2[i]%** Charge, then makes Mem deal Ice DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Mem's ATK to all enemies.

tree.name: Almighty Companion
tree.description: Memosprite Mem has an initial SPD of **1[i]** and a Max HP equal to ****2[i]%**** of Trailblazer's Max HP plus ****4[i]****. For every **3[i]** Energy regenerated by all allies in total, Mem gains 1% Charge.

tree.name: Memories Back as Echoes
tree.description:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** second(s). Enemies within the Special Dimension are placed in a Time Stop state, halting all their actions.
After entering battle against enemies afflicted with the Time Stop state, **delays the action** of all enemies by **2[i]%**, and then deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to **3[i]%** of Trailblazer's ATK.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: Rhapsode's Scepter
tree.description: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's **action advances** by **30%**. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem **40%** Charge.

tree.name: Petite Parable
tree.description: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains **5%** Charge.

tree.name: Magnets and Long Chains
tree.description: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds **100**, for every **10** excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the **True DMG** dealt via "Mem's Support" by **2%**, up to a max increase of **20%**.

ranks.name: Narrator of the Present
ranks.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of ally targets with "Mem's Support" by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When an ally target has "Mem's Support," the effect of "Mem's Support" also applies to the target's memosprite/memomaster. This effect cannot stack.

ranks.name: Gleaner of the Past
ranks.description: When ally memosprites (aside from Mem) take action, Trailblazer regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy. This effect can trigger a max of <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s) per turn. The trigger count resets at the start of Trailblazer's turn.

ranks.name: Chanter of the Future
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Dancer of the Muse
ranks.description: When an ally target with 0 Max Energy actively uses an ability, Mem can also gain <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> Charge, and the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by this target via "Mem's Support" additionally increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Seamster of the Ode
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Bearer of the Revelation
ranks.description: Ultimate's CRIT Rate is set at <unbreak>100%</unbreak>.
